oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Farmer-Labor School
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Flyer for two-week farmer-labor school, to teach farmers and industrial workers how to organize in their community, noting that "Workers and Farmers rise or fall as one person." Topics covered include cooperatives, public speaking, planning political activities, and leadership principles.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Labor unions--Organizing--United States; Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Agriculture, Cooperative; Farmers; Agricultural laborers; United States. Labor Management Relations Act, 1947; Congress of Industrial Organizations (U.S.); Parliamentary practice; Labor laws and legislation; Political action committees; Labor leaders; Brotherhood of Railroad Trainmen; Farmers Union (U.S.); American Federation of Labor; Labor unions and education
